[`func advanced(by: CGFloat) -> CGFloat`](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat-swift.struct/advanced(by:))Returns a `Self` `x` such that `self.distance(to: x)` approximates `n`.[`func distance(to: CGFloat) -> CGFloat`](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat-swift.struct/distance(to:))Returns a stride `x` such that `self.advanced(by: x)` approximates `other`.
